Speaker: NPCDef_Blacksmith
Text: Welcome to my forge! What can I do for you today?
Do you have any work for me?

Speaker: NPCDef_Blacksmith
Text: Yes! I need someone to gather iron ore from the northern mines. Dangerous work, but I'll pay well.
I'll gather the ore for you.
Maybe another time.

Speaker: NPCDef_Blacksmith
Text: Excellent! Bring me 10 iron ore and I'll make it worth your while. Be careful out there.

Speaker: NPCDef_Blacksmith
Text: No problem. Come back when you're ready for some honest work.
What are your prices?

Speaker: NPCDef_Blacksmith
Text: Fair prices for quality work! I don't cheat honest folk. Take a look at my wares.
Nothing right now, goodbye.

Speaker: NPCDef_Blacksmith
Text: Safe travels! Come back if you need anything forged.

Speaker: NPCDef_Guard
Text: Halt! State your business in town.
I'm just a traveler passing through.

Speaker: NPCDef_Guard
Text: Alright, move along then. But stay out of trouble.
I have a merchant's pass.

Speaker: NPCDef_Guard
Text: A merchant, eh? Welcome to town. The market square is straight ahead.
None of your business.

Speaker: NPCDef_Guard
Text: Watch your tone, stranger. I've got my eye on you.

Speaker: NPCDef_Merchant
Text: Greetings, friend! Care to see my wares? I have items from across the land!
Show me what you have.

Speaker: NPCDef_Merchant
Text: Take your time! Everything is priced fairly, I assure you.
Any news from your travels?

Speaker: NPCDef_Merchant
Text: Ah, I've heard rumors of bandits on the northern road. Best be careful if you're heading that way.
Not interested, goodbye.

Speaker: NPCDef_Merchant
Text: Safe travels! I'll be here if you change your mind.
